entry.title: CGRR transferred toÂ github
entry.summary: After many months of procrastination, I’ve finally split up my cgrr project and transferred it to github. It took quite a while, but in the end I think it will be much more maintainable and useful with each of the parser modules taken separately than it would be with them all jammed together pretending to be plugins for some yet-unwritten master program. If I want to write some wrapper around them all later, they’ll perfectly well support it, but until then, all the plugin stuff is just an extra mess—YAGNI.
